item.description:
Ok folks, for those of you where the passion of riding overtakes all else, we are doing a mid-day ride on Friday. The weather is supposed to be Sunny and close to 60, not bad as long as you layer up.

We are meeting at the Dunkin Donuts 1550 West Main Road, Portsmouth, RI 02871 at 1030am.

There's no set path of travel yet, ideas are welcome. This is more of a get together meet some folks, and get some riding in type ride. Its also a good warmup for Saturday's ride, to shake off the rust.

I hope to see some of you all brave the cold, get out and ride on one of the last rides this season, meet some people, and enjoy the day.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Oktoberfest - Friday Mid-Day Ride
